title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are currently enabled.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled by default.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the ImageAnalyzer example. Notice that the scrollbars on the image are enabled. The expected behavior is for the scrollbars to be disabled, indicating that the image fits within the container without the need for scrolling.
